SocketAddr &  client_addr
)  [static]
 

Accepts incoming client connection request. The ID of the new accepted client socket is returned. Asserts if sock_id references a client socket.

Parameters:

void SioSocketAdapter::Init (  const SioSocketCallbacks &  callbacks  )  [static]
 

Initializes the SIO socket adapter. If the SIO socket handler is not initialized then all the following calls on it assert.

Parameters:
callbacks Reference to structure of callback function pointers.

BOOLEAN SioSocketAdapter::Listen (  SocketId  sock_id,
INT  backlog
)  [static]
 

Puts the socket with sock_id into listen state. Asserts if sock_id references a client socket.

Returns:
Success of operation.
